tasks.task_description: Create CloudFront distribution with S3 origin
Update S3 bucket policy for CloudFront access
Configure custom error pages for SPA routing
Update deploy script with CloudFront URL

description: Enable HTTPS for Quiz Educativo using CloudFront CDN
context: CloudFront distribution created successfully with ID E3JHTE5V1SO0H5 and domain d3pi45ypt1epmm.cloudfront.net. OAC configured with ID E2BGC3QRRJHZXG.
S3 bucket policy updated to allow access only from CloudFront distribution using OAC.
Deploy script updated with CloudFront HTTPS URL and cache invalidation. Distribution still deploying (InProgress status).
CloudFront distribution is configured and will be available shortly. HTTPS URL ready for QR code distribution.
